text: Mariyu allah mariyu ayana pravakta taraphu nundi pedda hajj rojuna sarvamanava jatiki prakatana ceyabadutondi: "Niscayanga, allah mariyu ayana pravaktaku, bahudaivaradhakulato, elanti sambandham ledu. Kavuna miru (o musrikulara!) Pascattapapadite, adi mi meluke. Kani miru vimukhulaite, miru allah (siksa) nundi tappincukolerani telusukondi." Mariyu satyatiraskarulaku badhakaramaina siksa (vidhincabada) nunnadane vartanu vinipincu
